articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Grand Music and Dance Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Grand Music and Dance Performance
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a grand music and dance performance "Long March for Victory of Songun" given by artistes of the State Merited Chorus, the KPA Song and the Dance Ensemble, the KPA Military Band, the song and dance ensembles of the Commands of the KPA Navy and Air Force and other art organizations of KPA. 
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers of diverse genres as mixed grand choruses "Song Devoted to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il", narration and mixed chorus "Please Receive Our Salute", Ounkum ensemble and mixed Panchang "Dear General, Where Are You", dance "A Soldier Hears Rice Ears Sway", narration and mixed chorus "We Will Never Forget Those Days", female octet and mixed Panchang "Push back the Frontiers of the latest Science" and Chorus poem "Long Live the Great Songun Politics". 
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal revolutionary exploits of the great brilliant commander of Songun who has firmly defended the socialist homeland and ushered in a new era of prosperity and clearly reflected the unshakable faith and indomitable will of all the service persons and people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche which started on Mt. Paektu and the cause of building a thriving nation, remaining single-mindedly loyal to him.
					
					  They also fully demonstrated the might of army artistes who are steering the era of Songun with loud revolutionary army songs.
					
					 He highly praised the artistes of the People's Army for having staged a splendid performance pervaded with the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu and the revolutionary soldier spirit and extended thanks to all the creators and artistes. 
					
					 The performance made a grand epic representation of the stirring reality in the DPRK dynamically advancing along the orbit of innovations and leap forward under the uplifted banner of Songun, he noted, underscoring the need to make the idea and spirit and work style of the People's Army to prevail throughout the society and thus energetically wage the general offensive for greeting the 65th anniversary of the WPK as a grand festival of victors in all fields.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces,  KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Kuk Tae and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, leading officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media.

articles.title: Flood Victims Rescued by Servicepersons
articles.content:
Flood Victims Rescued by Servicepersons
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Planes of the air force and warships of the navy of the Korean People's Army rushed to the area of Sinuiju, North Phyongan Province, hit by sudden torrential rain and successfully conducted an emergency operation on August 21 to rescue the inhabitants who were at the crossroads of life and death.
					 Unprecedented downpour hit the northeastern area of China on August 19 and 20, causing flooding in rivers. This also adversely affected the northwestern area of Korea.
					
					5,300 cubic meters of water rushed into the River Amnok per second from a river of China, causing the water level of the river to rise suddenly from 0:00 on August 21. As a result, the river swelled in a minute, leaving even Sinuiju City inundated. This paralyzed traffic and did damage to many objects.
					
					 Hardest hit by flooding were Sangdan-ri, Hadan-ri, Taji-ri, Soho-ri in Uiju County, Ojok Islet and Maksa Islet in Sinuiju City. They were completely submerged and single-story houses went under water.  
					
					 The flood victims were at a loss on the roof tops of buildings and hills.
					
					 The institutions concerned took emergency measures to rescue the victims but the damage was so serious that they proved unsuccessful. Upon hearing this, General Secretary Kim Jong Il ordered KPA units to immediately launch rescue operations.
					
					Air force units sent dozens of planes and navy units warships and various types of means and succeeded in evacuating at least 5,150 flood victims to safe areas in close touch with officials of party and power organs and people's security organs in the flood-hit areas.
					
					 The inhabitants in the flood-ravaged areas and servicepersons who were mobilized for the rescue operations noted in excited tone that the socialist system in the DPRK is the most advantageous and benevolent one as the life and properties of people are protected by servicepersons and Kim Jong Il is the greatest father as he provided this land of bliss for the people.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors hurled dozens of puppet MPs and operatives of the "Ministry of Unification" and the intelligence service to the area of the south side in Panmunjom on August 20 to walk off Rev. Han Sang Ryol, reunification champion of south Korea, by taking his both arms the moment he crossed the demarcation line dividing Korea into the north and the south.
					 A spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement released on Sunday bitterly denounced in the name of all Koreans the group of traitors for unreasonably arresting and detaining Rev. Han for punishment  despite the DPRK's warning and concern of public at home and abroad.
					
					 All the activities conducted by him throughout his stay in the north can never be a crime under any circumstances as they were entirely just and praiseworthy ones for defending and implementing the north-south joint declaration and achieving reconciliation, unity and reunification of the nation, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Had the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors neither brought the inter-Korean relations to a collapse nor blocked the activities of reunification movement organizations nor pushed the situation to the brink of a war through such hideous anti-DPRK plots as the warship case and exercises for a war of aggression against the north, Rev. Han would not have taken the trouble of making a trip at the risk of his life.
					
					 Rev. Han chanted at the top of his voice the slogan "Long live the attainment of reunification and peace in the spirit of By our nation itself," crossing the above-said line is the irresistible echo of the era.
					
					 The Lee group should set free at once Rev. Han who had been thrown into behind bars at the point of bayonet and immediately stop the fascist suppression of the reunification movement organizations of people of various circles.
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad should turn out as one in the actions for seeking the release of pro-reunification patriotic personages including the unjustly arrested Rev. Han and holding in check the moves of the puppet group to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Make Apology for Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Make Apology for Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea made public a statement on Sunday on the occasion of the lapse of a centenary since the Japanese imperialists fabricated the illegal "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty".
					  The statement said that the treaty cooked up by the Japanese imperialist aggressors on August 22, 1910, was a completely illegal and invalid document and an unprecedented criminal document of aggression in view of historical facts and from the viewpoint of international law. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists enforced the harshest colonial rule in history over Korea, bringing unspeakably horrible misfortune and sufferings and disasters to the Korean nation, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 Japan should make a sincere apology and make full reparation to the Korean nation for its aggression and crimes against humanity.
					
					 Japan has not yet admitted the past hideous state-sponsored crimes and dodged the responsibility for redeeming them. On the contrary it is working with blood-shot eyes to stage a comeback to Korea, as evidenced by its bid to grab Tok Islets, distorting and beautifying its history of aggression. 
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the Japanese reactionaries have become evermore undisguised in their moves to hatch plots and apply sanctions against the DPRK and persecute and crack down upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, in pursuance of the U.S. hostile policy toward it.  They are taking part in the anti-DPRK war maneuvers of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities in a bid to realize the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere." 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' moves for reinvasion and anti-DPRK smear campaign are encouraged by the Lee Myung Bak group's sycophancy and treachery to serve Japan.
					
					 The DPRK will force Japan to make an apology and reparation for the crimes committed by it to the last, staking the dignity and honor of the Korean nation, and never pardon the Japanese reactionaries' anachronistic moves for reinvasion of Korea and confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries had better stop their rash actions, clearly aware that their reinvasion moves and anti-DPRK racket going against the need of the times will only bring them self-destruction. They should promptly make sincere apology and reparation for the past crimes.

articles.title: Officials Visit Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Officials Visit Revolutionary Site
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Senior state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of party organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions Sunday visited the Ssangunri Revolutionary Site on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					The revolutionary site is the land of glory where Kim Jong Il together with President Kim Il Sung provided field guidance to the Command of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division on August 25, Juche 49 (1960), starting his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					Visitors placed bouquets before the monument to field guidance provided by Kim Il Sung before looking round the monument to the poem praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary feats. 
					
					Going round the servicepersons' hall, barracks, a mess hall, an office, dwellings, a broad and flat rock and others associated with leadership of Kim Jong Il, they keenly realized the noble personality of him who, together with Kim Il Sung, rendered devoted service for the army-building and the improvement of the standard of serviceperson's living. 
					
					They also watched an art performance given by servicepersons.

articles.title: Gift from Switzerland-Korea Committee Chairman
articles.content:
Gift from Switzerland-Korea Committee Chairman
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official of the DPRK mission in Switzerland on August 14.

articles.title: National Symposiums Held
articles.content:
National Symposiums Held
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A national scientific symposium was held from August 18 to 20 to commemorate General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of immortal leadership at Kim Il Sung University.
					 Presented to the symposium, divided into sections of social science and natural science, were at least 4,100 papers worked out by teachers and researches in the course of waging dynamic educational and scientific activities.
					
					 Introduced at the symposium of social science were such papers as "The Songun revolutionary leadership feats performed by the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il during his days at Kim Il Sung University are precious revolutionary treasure for carrying forward to completion the Songun revolutionary cause," "The undying exploits performed in successfully carrying forward and developing the tradition of great revolutionary surge," "The Songun politics is powerful political mode based on philosophy on arms," etc.
					
					 The speakers elaborated on the fact that thanks to Kim Jong Il's energetic ideological and theoretical activities, untiring thinking and pursuit at Kim Il Sung University, lots of theoretical and practical issues arising in economics, history, philosophy, etc. were clarified on a scientific basis.
					
					 The symposium of natural science heard valuable papers worked out in the course of conducting brisk scientific researches to put the nation's science and technology and economy as a whole on a high stage.
					
					 A national symposium of university students took place on August 19 on the same occasion.
					
					 Speakers there described Kim Jong Il's leadership at Kim Il Sung University as an epochal-making event in carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Il laid a foundation for successfully inheriting the revolutionary cause of Juche through his unique ideo-theoretical activities and led the university students to prepare themselves as staunch revolutionaries who are intensely loyal to the Party and the leader and have ardent love for the country and the nation and the socialist motherland and as persons with noble ideological and moral qualities.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists Accused of Occupying Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists Accused of Occupying Korea
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists were the most ferocious aggressors who illegally occupied Korea after fabricating an international treaty in utter disregard of international law and norms and principles of international relations in a bid to establish brazen-faced colonial rule over it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It cites facts to prove that the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", which the Japanese imperialists cooked up by use of military force against the representative of the state after encircling the royal palace with aggressor armed forces in a bid to annex Korea, was an illegal and false document as it totally ignored the elementary requirements of international law on the conclusion of a treaty.
					
					 Referring to evidence proving that the treaty was a fraudulent document which had no signature of the Emperor, the supreme ruler of the feudal state of the Ri Dynasty, the article says:
					
					 In recent years the Japanese reactionaries have taken much pain to give the sham treaty legality, asserting that "it was chosen by the Koreans" and "the treaty went through all formalities" and the like. This is an intolerable insult to the Korean people who had been subject to the bitter colonial slavery enforced by the Japanese imperialists for dozens of years and a mockery of international law and human conscience. 
					
					 The treaty was nothing but an illegal, unjust and false document, a blank sheet of paper, as it was cooked up by the Japanese imperialists' high-handed practices and fraud and swindle and by such pro-Japanese lackeys as Ri Wan Yong who yielded to them.
					
					 For fear of the protest and condemnation from the Korean people and the world after the fabrication of the above-said treaty, the Japanese imperialists had kept it secret and made it public only a week later. 
					
					 The Korean people will not forget the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against them no matter how much water may flow under the bridge but certainly settle accounts with Japan, the sworn enemy, concludes the article.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's "Unification Tax" Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's "Unification Tax" Flailed
  Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- After traitor Lee Myung Bak spelled out "unification tax" at the "August 15 commemoration address" the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification buckled down to building up public opinion for it. Some days ago, spokesman and deputy spokesman for the ministry vied with each other to bluster that they would "work out a concrete action program" concerning "unification tax", elicit "sympathy from people" through discussions with people of different social standings and "prepare follow-up measures" and the like. In other words, it is their intention to elicit support from people for "unification tax" and put it into practice.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 "Unification tax" spelled out by traitor Lee Myung Bak is an undisguised revelation of his treacherous ambition for "unification of systems" while the rhetoric let loose by the coteries of "the Ministry of Unification" means the first-phase full-fledged action to put Lee's ambition into practice.
					
					 This is a hideous provocation against the dignity of the DPRK and the most advantageous socialist system in it and a declaration of vicious confrontation of systems which can never be pardoned by all the Koreans in the north and the south as the traitor had the nonsensical "contingency" in his mind when spelling out the "unification tax," the news analyst notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee group has gone desperate in its moves to build up public opinion over "unification tax", hoodwink the people and realize its wild ambition but it will get it nowhere.
					
					 The south Koreans will never be taken in by the group of traitors' rhetoric about "unification" intended to conceal its sinister ambition for "unification of systems" but will surely deal sledge-hammer blows at the group for its treacherous act of escalating confrontation between the north and the south and increasing the danger of a war.
					
					 The Lee group had better mind its own business on the verge of bankruptcy, before impudently spelling out "unification tax."

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Songun Politics
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Songun Politics
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics makes it possible for the national reunification movement to make dynamic advance, meeting the challenges of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The publication of the June 15 joint declaration would have been unthinkable without the great Songun politics, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Protected by Songun, the Korean nation could make dynamic advance toward reconciliation and cooperation and unity and reunification, foiling the obstructive moves of foreign forces and traitors.
					
					 The Songun politics helps strengthen the driving force for national reunification on a nationwide scale and closely rally all Koreans.
					
					 Grasping the might and vitality of the Songun politics in reality, all Koreans came to have confidence that they can frustrate any anti-reunification moves as long as the Songun politics is in force. This reinforces their awareness and faith in the driving force of the nation.
					
					 Koreans from all walks of life at home and abroad, attracted by the patriotic Songun politics, warmly support and uphold Songun and are turning out in the nationwide movement for national reunification irrespective of ideology and system.
					
					 The Songun politics paves the way for achieving peace and the cause of national reunification while decisively frustrating the moves of the warlike forces at home and abroad for a war of aggression against the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK has provided a sure guarantee for peace and the independent reunification, resolutely foiling the military provocations of the warmongers at home and abroad with the might of Songun.
					
					 The reality eloquently proves that the Songun politics serves as a banner of victory and a sure guarantee for accomplishing the cause of independent reunification.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Anti-Reunification Remarks Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Anti-Reunification Remarks Flailed
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress and other civic and public organizations of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on August 18, denouncing traitor Lee Myung Bak for his anti-reunification remarks.
					 Speakers at the conference blasted Lee Myung Bak for running the whole gamut of such vituperations as "proposal of three-phase unification" through "peaceful community," "economic community" and "national community" and "unification tax". 
					
					The "three-phase unification proposal" made by Lee Myung Bak is an extension of the anti-reunification confrontational policy based on watchwords "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars", which pushed the south-north relations to the present catastrophe, and talk about "unification tax" was prompted by his sinister scheme presupposing "emergency in the north", they charged.
					
					 If he is truly interested in talking about reunification, he should backtrack from his hostile policy toward the DPRK and clarify his stand on the implementation of the north-south declarations.
					
					 The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, too, released a statement on the same day in which it accused the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime of dampening the atmosphere of independence, peaceful reunification and the great national unity, which mounted in the wake of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, and intensifying the moves to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen, kick up a war racket, stamp out democracy and deteriorate the people's livelihood.

articles.title: Iranian President Meets DPRK Ambassador
articles.content:
Iranian President Meets DPRK Ambassador
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. should take its hands off the issue of inter-Korean relations and withdraw at once its troops from south Korea.
					 President of Iran Mahmoud Ahmadinejad said this on Aug. 17 when DPRK Ambassador to Iran Jo In Chol presented his credentials to him.
					
					 The relations between Iran and the DPRK are traditional, friendly and solid relations, the president said, adding that Iran highly appreciates the anti-U.S. position of the Korean people standing on the joint front against imperialism.
					
					 He wished the Korean people success in their efforts to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012.

articles.title: Fascist Suppression of Rev. Han Sang Ryol Flailed
articles.content:
Fascist Suppression of Rev. Han Sang Ryol Flailed
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on August 20 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its fascist suppression of Rev. Han Sang Ryol, reunification champion of south Korea who visited the DPRK on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 His visit to the DPRK was fully supported by all the Koreans at home and abroad as it was a manifestation of his firm will to instill patriotism for reunification into the Koreans and give a steady continuity to the trend of independent reunification, and a quite just and righteous action to defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and achieve national reconciliation and unity, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 By arresting him the Lee Myung Bak regime self-exposed the anti-reunification nature of the authorities of the south side who persistently pursue division and confrontation against improved south-north relations and the peaceful reunification of the country, to say nothing of the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The Lee regime should stop suppressing Rev. Han and immediately set him free, the statement urged, declaring that they would resolutely foil the south side authorities' unwarranted moves to punish the reverend.

articles.title: UFG Blasted by British Organization
articles.content:
UFG Blasted by British Organization
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain released a statement on August 16 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for waging war maneuvers.
					 The U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime of south Korea are conducting all-out war maneuvers codenamed Ulji Freedom Guardian in the wake of the provocative joint naval exercises in the East and West Seas of Korea, the statement pointed out, and said: 
					
					 This saber-rattling, larger in scale than other military exercises, is apparently a war gamble to invade the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to turn the Asia-Pacific region into its colony.
					
					 UFG poses a threat to peace of not only the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region but the whole world.
					
					 The exercises are part of the undisguised and reckless moves to threaten the DPRK to make unilateral concession and, furthermore, to force it to abandon socialist system, and they amount to a grave encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The British Branch demands that the U.S. imperialists immediately stop UFG and get their armed forces withdrawn from south Korea, lift sanctions against the DPRK and stop threatening it with nukes, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Songun Leadership Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Songun Leadership Celebrated
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A lecture took place in Mexico, a seminar in Ukraine and round-table talks, photo exhibition and film show in Iran on Aug. 14 and 15 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 The coordinator of the coordinating commission of a provincial committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico noted with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il who has frustrated the anti-DPRK moves of the imperialist allied forces with his unique Songun politics unprecedented in the history of world politics, thus reliably defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation and Korean-style socialism.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the National Coordinating Committee of the Ukrainian Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Association for the Study of Songun Policy described the Songun politics as an ever-victorious treasured sword which reliably guarantees the security and sovereignty of the country and the nation, a powerful impetus for the prosperity of the country, and the banner of national unity and reunification and the politics displaying its great vitality.
					
					 The chairman of the "Sun of Juche" Association of Journalists and Men of Culture for the Study of Kimjongilism said that the Songun politics is the only almighty politics in the world which inherited the brilliant traditions established by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle and the Fatherland Liberation War and correctly reflected the requirement of the times.
					
					 The president and the secretary general of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran stressed that the DPRK's goal for building a thriving nation and its cause of national reunification would surely be realized as there are the wise and tested Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il and the people intensely loyal to him.
					
					 Appreciated at the film show was Korean film "Reply of Korea."
